answers.answer: Any reason why you elected to have a c section? Just curious....however glad everything is going well..

Several reasons actually. I had to get a c-section with my daughter, my hips and what not are to narrow, I'm really overweight, I went well over my due date with my daughter, and I have gestational diabetes.  Dr. told me from the start that I wasn't a very good candidate for a vbac and that it would be safer for me to have another c-section.
Oh ok....thanks for sharing that. This is my first child so I was just wondering why some choose c sections vs a vaginal delivery
Good luck momma.I wish I knew the day my baby would be coming but i just gotta be patient.

question: I got my c-section scheduled for Aug. 5th. =) As of my last appointment ( 6/14/13). My little boy was 4 pounds 10oz 17inches long @ 32 weeks, heart beat 158. According to my Dr. I'm at a no - low risk of going into preterm labor.  That everything looks good, for baby and myself. I was kinda bummed out that he had his face, facing my lower spine so we couldn't see his face. I don't think he likes his "picture" taken, cause the time before that he had his hands covering his face. I go back in 7/5/13. I cant wait!
title: Geting closer!
